type.models: Battle Mechaniks, Widowmakers, Winter Guard units

benefits.ingameeffect: Up to one heavy warjack gains Advance Move for each Battle Mechanik unit in the army.
You gain +1 on your starting roll for the game.
Your deployment zone is extended 2" forward.

type.models: Battle Mechaniks, Widowmakers, Man-o-war units, Winter Guard units
Manhunters, Widowmaker Marksmen, Man-o-war solos, Winter Guard solos

benefits.ingameeffect: For every two units in the army, place one 4" AOE forest anywhere completely within 20" of the back edge of Sorcha's deployment zone after terrain has been placed but before either player deploys his army. Forests cannot be placed within 3" of another terrain feature.
Man-o-war units gain Advance Move.
Model/units in the army gain Pathfinder during your first turn of the game.

type.models: Khador non-character warjacks with ranged attacks
Battle Mechaniks, Winter Guard units, Iron Fang Ulhans

benefits.ingameeffect: Mortars can make ranged attacks after making a full advance during your first turn.
Each warjack is allocated a free focus point in your first turn.

type.models: Kossite Woodsmen, Widowmakers, Man-o-war units, Winter Guard infantry
Manhunters, War dog, Widowmaker Marksmen, Yuri the Axe, Man-o-War solos

benefits.ingameeffect: Man-o-war units gain +2SPD during your first turn of the game.

You can redeploy solos after both players have deployed but before the first player's first turn. The redeployed models must be placed on the table in a location they could have been deployed initially.
Warjacks in the Butcher's battlegroup without ranged weapons gain Advance Deployment.

type.models: Khador non-character warjacks without ranged weapons.
Iron Fang solos, Manhunter, War Dog

benefits.ingameeffect: Iron Fang Pikemen units with Black Dragon Officer & Standard unit attachments gain Advance Move. (Before the start of the game but after both players have deployed, a model with Advance Move can make a full advance.)
You gain +1 on your starting game roll.
Models in the Butcher's battlegroup gain Advance Move. (Before the start of the game but after both players have deployed, a model with Advance Move can make a full advance.)

type.models: Manhunters, War dog, Fenris, Yuri the Axe, Doom Reavers solos

benefits.ingameeffect: You gain +1 on your starting roll of the game.
Zoktavir's base FOCUS at the start of the game and during your first turn is automatically 7. Do not roll for Arcane Dementia.

type.models: Doom Reavers units, Winter guard units
Fenris, Manhunters, War Dog, Winter Guard solos, Yuri the Axe

benefits.ingameeffect: Models/units in the army gain Pathfinder during your first turn of the game.

For each Gun Carriage in the army, place one 4" AOE completely within 20" of the back edge of Zoktavir’s deployment zone after terrain has been placed but before either player deploys his army. These AOEs are rough terrain. Rough terrain AOEs cannot be placed within 3" of a terrain feature or another rough terrain AOE.

type.models: Battle Mechaniks, Greylord units, Iron Fang units

benefits.ingameeffect: Iron Fang Pikemen units gain +2SPD during your first turn of the game.
If the only warjacks in Vladimir's battlegroup are Berserkers and/or Drago, warjacks in Vladimir's battlegroup gain Advance Deployment
Reduce the cost of Man-0-War units and Man-0-War Kovnik in this army by 1

You can redeploy one unit, for each Man-0-War Kovnik in this army, after both players have deployed but before the first player's first turn. The redeployed models must be placed on the table in a location they could have been deployed initially.
One Man-0-War Units and one Man-0-War Kovnik gain Advance Deployment.
Warjacks gain +2SPD first turn.

type.models: Kossite Woodsmen, Widowmakers, Iron Fang units

benefits.ingameeffect: The Great Bears of Gallowswood gain Advance Deployment.

Friendly models/units can begin the game affected by Vladimir's upkeep spells. These spells and their targets must be declared before either player sets up models. Vladimir does not pay focus to upkeep these spells during your first turn.
Your deployment zone is extended 2" forward.
Increase the FA of non-character cavalry solos, units, and battle engines by 1.
Warjacks in this army gain +2 SPD during y our first turn of the game.
You gain + 1 on your starting roll for the game.
Reduce the cost of warjacks in this army by 1.

type.models: Assault Kommandos, Battle Mechaniks, Iron Fang units, Man-O-War units
War Dog, Iron Fang solos, Man-O-War solos

benefits.ingameeffect: You gain +1 on your starting roll for the game.
Man-O-War units gain Advance Move.
Your deployment zone is extended 2" forward.

type.models: Battle Mechaniks, Widowmakers, Kayazi units, Winter Guard units
Widowmaker Marksmen, Kayazi solos, Winter Guard solos

benefits.ingameeffect: Kayazi models/units gain Advance Move.
Each warjack in Irusk's battlegroup is automatically allocated 1 focus point at the start of your first control phase. This focus is in addition to any points Irusk allocates.

type.models: Khador non-character warjacks with one or more Open Fist, Khador character warjacks with one or more Open Fist
Battle Mechaniks, Light Artillery units, Iron Fang units, Man-O-War units

benefits.ingameeffect: For each Battle Mechanik unit, place one trench template anywhere within 20" of the back edge of Irusk's deployment zone after terrain has been placed but before either player deploys his or her army. Trench templates cannot be placed within 3" of a terrain feature but can be placed within 3" of each other.
Your deployment zone is extended 2" forward.

type.models: Battle Mechaniks, Greylord units, Man-O-War units

benefits.ingameeffect: Man-0-War units gain Advance Move. (Before the start of the game but after both players have deployed, a model with Advance Move can make a full advance.)

For each Greylord Ternion unit, place up to one 3" AOE cloud effects in play after terrain has been placed but before either player deploys his army. AOEs must be placed within 20" of the back edge of Karchev's deployment zone and remain in play for one round. They cannot be placed within 3" of a terrain feature. These cloud effects leave play after the first round of the game.

type.models: Battle Mechaniks, Greylord Ternions, Kossite Woodsmen, Widowmakers
Manhunters, Widowmaker Marksmen, Yuri the Axe

benefits.ingameeffect: Models/units in the army gain Stealth during the first round of the game.

Friendly models/units can begin the game affected by the Old Witch's upkeep spells. These spells and their targets must be declared before either player sets up models. The Old Witch does not pay focus to upkeep these spells during your first turn.

Models/units in the army gain Pathfinder during your first turn of the game. For each heavy warjack in the Old Witch's battlegroup, place one 4" AOE forest anywhere completely within 20" of the back edge of her deployment zone after terrain has been placed but before either player deploys his army. Forests cannot be placed within 3" of another terrain feature.

type.models: Battle Mechaniks, Doom Manhunters, Fenris, Reavers, Greylord units
Manhunters, Fenris, Doom Reavers solos, Greylord solos

benefits.ingameeffect: Koldun Lord solos and the warjacks marshal gain Advance Deployment
Models in Zerkova's battlegroup gain +2 SPD during your first turn of the game.

type.models: Khador non-character warjacks with ranged weapons, Marauders
Greylord units, Kayazy units, Widowmaker units
Gorman di Wulfe, Greylord solos, Kayazy solos, Widowmaker solos

benefits.ingameeffect: Zerkova’s battlegroup can include Vanguard light warjacks. These warjacks are considered to be friendly Khador warjacks.

For each Greylord unit in the army, place one 3" AOE cloud effect anywhere completely within 20" of the back edge of Zerkova’s deployment zone after both players have finished deploying their armies but before the first player takes his first turn. These cloud effects leave play after the first round of the game.
Your deployment is extended 2" forward.

type.models: Assault Kommandos, Kayazy Assassins, Kossite Woodsmen, Widowmakers

benefits.ingameeffect: Assault Kommando units gain Advance Deployment

For each Assault Kommando unit, place one trench template anywhere within 20" of the back edge of Strakhov's deployment zone after terrain has been placed but before either player deploys his or her army. Trench templates cannot be placed within 3" of a terrain feature but can be placed within 3" of each other.

Friendly models/units can begin the game affected by the Strakhov's upkeep spells. These spells and their targets must be declared before either player sets up models. Strakhov does not pay focus to upkeep these spells during your first turn.

type.models: Battle Mechaniks, Man-O-War units, Winter Guard units
War Dog, Man-O-War solos, Widowmaker Marksmen, Winter Guard solos

benefits.ingameeffect: You gain + 1 on your starting roll for the game.

Friendly models/units can begin the game affected by the Harkevich's upkeep spells. These spells and their targets must be declared before either player sets up models. Harkevich does not pay focus to upkeep these spells during your first turn.

For each warjacks in Harkevich's battlegroup, place one heavy wreck marker anywhere within 20" of the back edge of Strakhov's deployment zone after terrain has been placed but before either player deploys his or her army. Wreck markers cannot be placed within 3" of a terrain feature or another wreck marker.
The army can include up to one Mercenary unit if that unit includes Koldun Kapitan Valachev.
For each Greylord unit in the army, one warjack gains Advance Move. (Before the start of the game but after both players have deployed, a model with Advance Move can make a full advance.)
You gain +1 on your starting roll for the game.
For every two warjacks add one Koldun Lord Solo to the army free of cost. This solo does not count toward FA restrictions.
